item.description:
Once again come join us at the ever popular (and inexpensive) Sunday Brunch at the Gaslight. Those of you who have come before know that it's a great way to meet, converse & enjoy the company of Sitzers and (future) friends.

As always, we will be indulging in a choice of 3 entrees, 2 juices, coffee or tea and a sweet ala Julia Child for the affordable price of $9.95 (tax & gratuity excluded)...a great deal!

In addition, there is FREE parking adjacent to the Gaslight.

Consider starting (or finishing) your Holiday shopping at the Winter SOWA Market and/or at the shops along Washington St.

RSVP by Dec 8th please. Limit to 40 attendees.

Paypal is NOT accepted at this event. You will pay your fare to your server.
item.name: Sunday Brunch @ The Gaslight
